product_name: Roxy Classic Board Shorts - Women's - 7" Inseam
long_description: With a 7 in. inseam for extra coverage, the Roxy Classic Board Shorts for women will have you heading straight for the water in simple, time-honored board short style. Soft, durable polyester sheds water quickly for all-day comfort in and around the water; spandex offers 4-way stretch. Wide waistband with drawstring provides a comfortable fit. Hand wash the Roxy Classic Board Shorts in cold water. Back welt pocket; Roxy logo detail.
short_description: With a 7 in. inseam for extra coverage, the Roxy Classic Board Shorts for women will have you heading straight for the water in simple, time-honored board short style.
